deduction_content: The kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight

questions.question: What is the error code for Chuài Tuí (Side Kick)?
What is the main deduction point for Chuài Tuí (Side Kick)?
questions.answer: Deduction is applied when the kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight.

questions.question: What is the minimum angle requirement for the bent leg before extending in Chuài Tuí?
questions.answer: The kicking leg must be bent at least 45° or more before transitioning to completely straight.
